com.pcloud.networking.api

Class ApiComposer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.networking.api.ApiComposer

  • public class ApiComposer
extends java.lang.Object
    Composes implementations for interfaces in which you have provided methods that describe your network calls
    See Also:
    EndpointProvider, PCloudAPIClient, ResponseInterceptor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ApiComposer.Builder
      A builder to build instances of ApiComposer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PCloudAPIClient apiClient()
      Returns the PCloudAPIClient you provided in the ApiComposer.Builder
      <T> T compose(java.lang.Class<T> apiType)
      Composes an instance of the java interface which houses the network call methods
      static ApiComposer.Builder create()
      Creates and returns a ApiComposer.Builder to build the ApiComposer with
      EndpointProvider endpointProvider()
      Returns the EndpointProvider you provided in the ApiComposer.Builder
      java.util.List<ResponseInterceptor> interceptors()
      Returns a List of all the ResponseInterceptor objects you provided in the ApiComposer.Builder
      ApiComposer.Builder newBuilder()
      Returns a new instance of a ApiComposer.Builder to build a new ApiComposer
      Transformer transformer()
      Returns the Transformer you provided in the ApiComposer.Builder

      • compose

        public <T> T compose(java.lang.Class<T> apiType)
        Composes an instance of the java interface which houses the network call methods

        Note that you should provide an interface which does not extend anything or else this wont work!

        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the returned instance
        Parameters:
        apiType - The class of the java interface in which you have written the methods to represent the network calls
        Returns:
        An instance of a class of the same generic type as the class you provided as an argument implementing the interface in which you have written methods to represent your network calls
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if loadEagerly is set to true and if the instantiation fails

      • newBuilder

        public ApiComposer.Builder newBuilder()
        Returns a new instance of a ApiComposer.Builder to build a new ApiComposer
        Returns:
        A new instance of a ApiComposer.Builder to build a new ApiComposer
